Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
About
Scroll Down to Content
Come As You Are
A little off the beaten path tucked in just past Marina Del Mar next to
Rainbow Reef Dive Center MM100. You will find us canalside on Key Largo
Harbour.
Since 2001 we have been a local favorite and have now become a not so
hidden favorite for tourists as well. Our 2 floors provide something for
everyone. With quiet family style dining room on the 2nd floor, serving
breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Dine in comfortable A/C or on the patio. Watch the
boats go by as fishermen and divers head out for a day on the water.
First floor has Sharkey’s Pub and Taphouse with 32 taps and full liquor bar.
We are Key Largo’s best local sports bar with 20 TVs and 2 outside patios to
watch you favorite sports teams. Serving the same full menu for lunch and
dinner as 2nd floor.
The menu has something for everyone. We are known for our Baja Style
Jumbo Fish Tacos, a local favorite. Specials change daily for lunch and
dinner featuring fresh local seafood, sandwiches, salads, and home cooking.
Don’t miss Fish Fryday with all ‘U’ Can Eat Mahi Mahi on Friday Nights!
Happy hours from 4 to 6 everyday offer the Sharkbite Menu with a
variety of appetizers at a great price. Also, all drinks and beer are $1 off.
Having grown over 18 years, we have become the place to go for the
latest Micro Brews. Specializing in local small batch beers from keys and
Florida breweries. Also offering a cool selection of specialty rums, bourbon,
and craft cocktails.
Relax and unwind, enjoy a cocktail, feel the island breeze, and listen to
the local musicians on the waterside patios nightly.
We are a green establishment as we care about the environment.
Eliminating plastic and single use products is our goal. Protecting our
island, the reefs, and doing our part one straw, plastic bag, or paper cup
at a time! Come as you are. Flip flops and t-shirts please!
**We offer a 10% discount to those staying at
Bay Side Inn Key Largo
.**
